issue.title: [R] Additional dplyr functionality
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17384](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17384). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Umbrella ticket to collect together tickets relating to implementing additional dplyr verbs or unimplemented arguments for implemented verbs.
